The chunk defines an event handler `onCurveAnim` that launches a Curve Animation UI and checks a menu item, likely within a graphical application's main frame class, enabling users to access curve animation tools.

def onCurveAnim(self, e):
        self.curveAnimUI = CurveAnimUI(self, self.editor)
        self.curveAnimUI.Show()
        self.curveAnimMenuItem.Check(True)
